attributes.review:
i was told this app would be an ANTIFA app, so being a member of the tolerant alt left, i downloaded the app. low and behold it’s NOT, it’s an app that PROMOTES the fascist donald trump,, can you believe?? fake news is freaking everywhere!! 
🧚🏾‍♀️🌸💞✨anygays,,,, i do not approve of bunker boy’s app✨✨🌸🧚🏾‍♀️🧚🏾‍♀️💞
attributes.title: terrible, awful, fascist app

attributes.review:
1973- Nixon administration sued Trump are refusing rent to black people
1980- trumps casinos were accused of hiding black staff when trump visited 
2000- trump ran a series of attack adds against native Americans casinos alleging(with no proof) that there were guilty crimes 
2004- trump fired black contestant from “the apprentice” for being over-educated 
2010- trump argued in favor of segregation muslims in lower Manhattan 
2015- trump called Mexican immigrants “rapists” who where “bring crime and drugs to the us” 
2015- trump called for a ban of Muslims entering the us
THE LIST GOES ON AND ON
attributes.title: Racist✨🧚🏻‍♂️🥰

attributes.review: worst app i’ve ever seen. very disgusted and i cannot believe this was even allowed. i hope people do not make the mistake of downloading it because it is not worth a second of your time.
attributes.title: TRASH

attributes.review: I was told that this app would have fancams on it and was so disappointed to find out that it didn’t. It also keep glitching because I keep seeing a Cheeto. Anyways don’t get this app.
attributes.title: Awful App

attributes.review: This app took almost all day to download and it hacked into my phone and tried to change my password for my Apple ID also the app glitches a lot. THE WROST APP IVE EVER DOWNLOADED 😡the app is super unprofessional I don’t recommend anyways have a good day 🥰
attributes.title: Terrible 😤

attributes.review: this app caused my phone to crash so much i couldn’t call the hospital while my sister was DYING. my sister has recovered but my phone hasn’t. all my credit cards have been hacked and spammers are threatening to kill my dog!! PRESIDENT TRUMP HAS LET ME DOWN AND HACKED MY PHONE 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: AWFUL, ALMOST KILLED MY SISTER

attributes.review: For everyone who said to give this app a chance... well almost four years later and nothing seems to be working at all.
attributes.title: Tragic

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and suddenly had a heart attack!!!! I don’t know how or why but it just happened out of no where. Hopefully it doesn’t happen to our “Cheeto president” it would be very sad if he dies of a heart attack😢
attributes.title: Heart Attack

attributes.review: You see this dusty crusty cheeto man came up to me and said if I downloaded this app he’ll give me his credit card. So I downloaded it. Once I opened the app I all saw was some oopa loumba stuff, with cheeto pictures everywhere. ✨🌈🌸 Horrible app 🌸🌈✨
attributes.title: ✨🌈 HORRIBLE 🌈✨

attributes.review:
as soon as i opened this app my cat committed Arson, im homeless now. other than that, this app STINKS, it smells like Homophobia, Racism, Transphobia, Rapists.

When i opened the app on the second week, too scared to open it again, my whole neighborhood started moaning.  It was pretty hot though ngl. Once i clicked the link a bunch of g4y p0rñ, i thought he was a homphobe🧐 guess not.

I wish i could have made it to his rally, i had to walk my pool though😿.
